subject: Curious about my order!
description_text:
Made an order 16 "business days" ago and chose EXPRESS SHIPPING  5 to 8 day
delivery, been in transit for 13 days now. At this point it was a complete
rip-off to pay an extra $29.99 for shipping when it has been in transit
longer than free shipping. This is a joke!
I would really appreciate if I could figure out where my order is #SSN1782
1 x Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration
Feedback
VAM Pro Set (3 pac/includes power supply)

conversations.body_text:
Received my second package today. Everything is all good you have a great
day
